## Postdoctoral Researcher  
**University of Bern**, Institute for Theoretical Physics, Switzerland  
*2024 – Present*

**Research topics:**
- Leading hadronic contributions to the muon anomalous magnetic moment \( g - 2 \) using lattice QCD
- Numerical algorithms for large-scale lattice simulations (e.g. Nested Sampling for lattice gauge theories)
- Development of machine learning algorithms for Hamiltonian simulations on the lattice
